question.helpText: A MA employee is anyone who works for a business or a state or federal government agency that is located in the Commonwealth.

options.label: No
options.message: You are not required to remit payment to the department starting 7/1.

question.content: How many of your MA employees receive W2s?
How many contractors (1099-MISCs) have you hired in the past year?

paragraph.content: You are required to send the employee share of the contribution on behalf of your employees and contractors to the department starting July 1, 2019.
paragraph.helpText: Employers that contract more than half of their workforce using IRS Form 1099-MISC are required to consider these individuals as full time employees.

paragraph.content: You are also required to pay the employer share of the contribution for medical leave.
paragraph.helpText: If you have 25 or more workers, you need to pay the employer share

paragraph.content: You are required to send the employee share of the contribution on behalf of your employees (W2s) to the department starting July 1, 2019.
You are also required to pay the employer share of the contribution for medical leave.
paragraph.helpText: If you have 25 or more workers, you need to pay the employer share.

paragraph.content: You are not required to contribute on behalf of your contractors.
paragraph.helpText: Employers that contract more than half of their workforce using IRS Form 1099-MISC are required to consider these individuals as full time employees.

paragraph.content: You are required to send the employee share of the contribution on behalf of your employees and contractors to the department starting July 1, 2019.
paragraph.helpText: Employers that contract more than half of their workforce using IRS Form 1099-MISC are required to consider these individuals as full time employees.

paragraph.content: You are not required to pay the employer share of the contribution for family and medical leave.
paragraph.triggerText: not required to pay the employer share
paragraph.helpText: If you have less than 25 workers, you do not need to pay the employer share.

paragraph.content: You are required to send the employee (W2s) share of the contribution starting July 1, 2019.
You are not required to pay the employer share of the contribution for family and medical leave.
